pageContext.claim: “Democrats at the top are killing the Great State of Virginia. If the three failing pols were Republicans, far stronger action would be taken.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to allegations of racism against Virginia's governor and attorney general and allegations of sexual assault against the lieutenant governor. But there is ample evidence that Trump's complaints would be more muted if the politicians were Republicans. He campaigned for Alabama senate candidate Roy Moore despite highly credible allegations of sexual misconduct, child molestation, and pedophilia.
